document.full_text: pia toscano was sent packing from "american idol" on thursday in an elimination that drew booing from the audience and visibly angered the judges.
document.title: pia toscano had premonition of shock "idol" exit
lines_and_colors: pia toscano was sent packing from "american idol" on thursday in an elimination that drew booing from the audience and visibly angered the judges.
